ygData.subject: Re: Words, WHERE?
ygData.msgSnippet: I get tons from my friends who don t use them.  have all your friends save WORDS for you. ;-) ... From: Naeeldar  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I get tons from my friends who don't use them. have all your friends save
WORDS for you. ;-)



----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, July 19, 1999 4:45 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Words, WHERE?


> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh in large quantities it's not going to happen. You'll get them in
> Lavastorm, Lake R which isn't to hard for you, Crocs occasionally and
about
> anywhere else. You basically just play and when you get them you get them
or
> you buy them usually both.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: johnathan spectre <jspectre@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Date: Sunday, July 18, 1999 10:49 PM
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Words, WHERE?
>
>
> >From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
> >
> >I keep hearing on this list how common words are and that people have
> stacks
> >and stacks of them. Could someone please share where they are to be found
> in
> >such large quantities? I was told that the lava crawlers in lavastorm
> >occasionally have them, out of 50 or so kills I found a single rune. I
was
> >also told crocs in Oasis have them, out of about 25 or so killed I never
> found
> >one. Someone suggested I go to Lake Rathetear but suggested it might be
> hard
> >for me at level 18.
> >
> >Anyway, would someone be willing to share where they find basic words in
> large
> >quantities so I can practice my skills? Or is it simply my very bad luck
to
> >have not found one yet (I don't even know what they look like..)
> >
> >Thanks,
> >
> >jspectre @ innoruuk
> >
